title: Hugo's Tacos - Atwater Village
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of the Hugo's brand, this is a walk-up, quick service eatery offering tacos, burritos, quesadilla, and bowls. Vegans could choose soy chorizo or just rice & bean filling and omit cheese. Ask if this location offers vegan soft serve.
